title: Petra Carved from Living Rock
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Petra Carved from Living Rock.

hook.text: Petra wasn't builtâ€”it was carved. The Nabataeans sculpted an entire city directly into sandstone cliffs.

buildup.text: Located in modern Jordan, Petra controlled vital trade routes for spices, silk, and incense around 300 BC.

discovery.text: The Treasury facade is 40 meters tall, carved top-down from scaffolding. Mistakes were permanentâ€”no adding stone back.

twist.text: An ingenious system of dams, channels, and cisterns stored flash flood water, sustaining 30,000 residents in a desert.

climax.text: Petra was lost to the Western world for 500 years until a Swiss explorer rediscovered it in 1812.

punchline.text: An entire city hidden inside a cliff.

quiz.question: How was Petra's architecture created?
